name: Convection
baseDescription: Reduces the mana cost of your Shock, Lightning Bolt, and Chain Lightning spells by 2%.

name: Concussion
baseDescription: Increases the damage done by your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Shock spells by 1%.

name: Earth's Grasp
baseDescription: Increases the health of your Stoneclaw Totem by 25% and the radius of your Earthbind Totem by 10%.

name: Elemental Warding
baseDescription: Reduces damage taken from Fire, Frost and Nature effects by 4%.

name: Call of Flame
baseDescription: Increases the damage done by your Fire Totems by 5%.

name: Elemental Focus
baseDescription: Gives you a 10% chance to enter a Clearcasting state after landing a critical strike with a Fire, Frost, or Nature damage spell. The Clearcasting state reduces the mana cost of your next damage spell by 100%.

name: Reverberation
baseDescription: Reduces the cooldown of your Shock spells by 0.2 sec.

name: Call of Thunder
baseDescription: Increases the critical strike chance of your Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning spells by 1%.

name: Improved Fire Totems
baseDescription: Reduces the delay before your Fire Nova Totem activates by 1 sec and decreases the threat generated by your Magma Totem by 50%.

name: Eye of the Storm
baseDescription: Gives you a 33% chance to gain focus after being hit by a damaging attack while casting any Shaman spell, lasting 6 sec.

name: Elemental Devastation
baseDescription: Your offensive spell crits will increase your chance to get a critical strike with melee attacks by 3% for 10 sec.

name: Storm Reach
baseDescription: Increases the range of your Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning spells by 3 yards.

name: Elemental Fury
baseDescription: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Searing, Magma, and Fire Nova Totems and your Fire, Frost, and Nature spells by 100%.

name: Lightning Mastery
baseDescription: Reduces the cast time of your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, and Lightning Shield spells by 0.1 sec.

name: Elemental Mastery
baseDescription: When activated, this spell gives your next Fire, Frost, or Nature damage spell a 100% critical strike chance and reduces the mana cost by 100%.
